sentence: Tuesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 8,091.25.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.18 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1.42 to 1 ratio.
There were 1263 advancers and 1793 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 113 stocks reached a 52 week high and 51 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.42% for the day; a total of -32.23 points.
Seagate Technology PLC ( STX ) had the largest percent change down (-7.71%) while Ulta Beauty, Inc. ( ULTA ) had the largest percent change gain rising 5.53%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.05% for the day; a total of -12.34 points.
Nike, Inc. ( NKE ) had the largest percent change down (-3.16%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 2.15%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
